TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsDocument extends System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsPartBase implements class System.IDisposable
Public Class XpsDocument Inherits XpsPartBase Implements IDisposable

summary.span: 提供用于保存 XPS 文档内容的 。

span.span: Provides a that holds the content of an XPS document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含，其中包含一个或多个元素。An contains a that comprises one or more elements. 构造函数已传递到了引用为编写、 存储和读取文档的内容的元素。The constructor is passed a reference to a for writing, storing, and reading the content elements of the document. 新的空[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]通过创建构造函数。A new empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] is created by using the constructor. 现有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]通过打开方法。An existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] is opened by using the method. A根添加到一个空[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]通过调用方法。A root is added to an empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] by calling the method. 此外可以与关联的打印机信息和控件的元素，或对各个和中存储的元素。 elements with printer information and control can also be associated with the , or on individual and elements that are stored in the . 有关详细信息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]请参阅 XML 纸张规范 (XPS) 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

summary.span: 关闭 XPS 文档 。

span.span: Closes the XPS document .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已打开以进行写访问，数据缓冲区写入到应用商店和物理文档已关闭。If the was opened for write access, data buffers are written to the store and the physical document is closed. 后已被调用，该文档的任何部分可以访问与此实例。After has been called, no parts of the document can be accessed with this instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何打开，插入内容，然后关闭。The following example shows how to open, insert content, and close an . MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the and optionally, releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的所有资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 其他对象可以调用多次。

span.span: Other objects can call multiple times.

para.span: 当你重写，请注意不要引用以前已释放的以前调用在对象。

span.span: When you override , be careful not to reference objects that were previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

Public Function SignDigitally (certificate As X509Certificate, embedCertificate As Boolean, restrictions As XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions) As XpsDigitalSignature

param.name: certificate
param.span: 用于对每个部件签名的 X.509 证书；或为 以提示用户选择已安装的证书。

param.name: embedCertificate
param.span: 若要在包中存储证书，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, .

param.name: restrictions

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`certificate`是`null`，会出现的对话框，使用户能够选择已安装的 X.509 证书，例如从智能卡读卡器。If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method.
